resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: This Bible contains the very rare Map of Canaan, printed from the Block used for the First Coverdale Bible; and it is the only copy of this Bible containing the Map, which I never knew to be for Sale. I never saw it in any Booksellers or Auctioneers’ Catalogue although I have been collecting more than Thirty years.
resource.chars: This Bible contains the very rare Map of Canaan, printed from the Block used for the First Coverdale Bible; and it is the only copy of this Bible containing the Map, which I never knew to be for Sale. I never saw it in any Booksellers or Auctioneers’ Catalogue although I have been collecting more than Thirty years.
